:::{#hero-heading}

I am currently a Postdoctoral Researcher in the Department of Mathematics at the University of Lisbon.  
I am working with [Bruno Loff]() on the Hardness of Finding Good Algorithms (project [HoFGA]()). I am a member of the research unit [LASIGE]() at the [Faculty of Sciences]() of the [University of Lisbon]().   

I completed my PhD under the guidance of [Prahladh Harhsa]() at TIFR, Mumbai. 

    

## Research Interests
Broadly interested in Complexity theory, in particular Circuit Complexity, Communication and Query Complexity, Analysis of Boolean functions, Data Structures lower bounds.
